title: Himalayan lakes
creator_credit: Gopal Datt, K Khandpur and Films Division, Government of India
brief_description: The beauty of the large lakes in the foothills region of the Himalayan Mountains, mecca of climbers and tourists from India and overseas. Includes many attractions in the numerous valleys - shrines, fast moving mountain streams and rushing rivers, Indian villages and house boats in all seasons of the year.
